3 area::area ()
4 {
5  // read parameters
6  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/cell_warn", cell_warn, 1000);
7  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/resolution", resolution, 1.0);
8  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/create_map", create_map, false);
9 
10  // check of global (gps) coordinates are used
11  string pos_type = "global";
12  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/pos_type", pos_type, pos_type);
13  global = pos_type == "local" ? false : true;
14 
15  // service client for converting gps to local coordinates
16  if (global) {
17  fix_to_pose_client = nh.serviceClient<cpswarm_msgs::FixToPose>("gps/fix_to_pose");
18  ROS_DEBUG("Wait for fix_to_pose service...");
19  fix_to_pose_client.waitForExistence();
20  }
21 }

23 bool area::get_area (cpswarm_msgs::GetPoints::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::GetPoints::Response &res)
24 {
25  res.points = coords;
26  return true;
27 }

29 bool area::get_center (cpswarm_msgs::GetPoint::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::GetPoint::Response &res)
30 {
31  // compute centroid / barycenter
32  for (auto c : coords) {
33  res.point.x += c.x;
34  res.point.y += c.y;
35  }
36  res.point.x /= coords.size();
37  res.point.y /= coords.size();
38  return true;
39 }

41 bool area::get_distance (cpswarm_msgs::GetDist::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::GetDist::Response &res)
42 {
43  bool init = true;
44 
45  // point to check
46  geometry_msgs::Point p0;
47 
48  // use origin
49  if (req.point.x == 0 && req.point.y == 0) {
50  p0.x = origin.x;
51  p0.y = origin.y;
52  }
53 
54  // use given point
55  else {
56  p0.x = req.point.x;
57  p0.y = req.point.y;
58  }
59 
60  // find minimal distance to any area bound
61  for (int i = 0; i < coords.size(); ++i) {
62  // coordinates of two neighboring polygon points
63  geometry_msgs::Point p1;
64  p1.x = coords[i].x;
65  p1.y = coords[i].y;
66  geometry_msgs::Point p2;
67  p2.x = coords[(i+1)%coords.size()].x;
68  p2.y = coords[(i+1)%coords.size()].y;
69 
70  // minimal distance to line connecting the two points
71  geometry_msgs::Point p02;
72  p02.x = p2.x - p0.x;
73  p02.y = p2.y - p0.y;
74  geometry_msgs::Point p12;
75  p12.x = p2.x - p1.x;
76  p12.y = p2.y - p1.y;
77  geometry_msgs::Point p10;
78  p10.x = p0.x - p1.x;
79  p10.y = p0.y - p1.y;
80  double dot = p12.x * p10.x + p12.y * p10.y;
81  double dis = hypot(p12.x, p12.y);
82  double r = dot / dis / dis;
83 
84  double dist;
85  geometry_msgs::Point closest;
86 
87  // p1 is closest point
88  if (r < 0) {
89  closest = p1;
90  dist = hypot(p10.x, p10.y);
91  }
92  // p2 is closest point
93  else if (r > 1) {
94  closest = p2;
95  dist = hypot(p02.x, p02.y);
96  }
97  // closest point is between p1 and p2
98  else {
99  dist = sqrt((p10.x*p10.x + p10.y*p10.y) - pow(r * hypot(p12.x, p12.y), 2));
100  double d1c = sqrt((p10.x*p10.x + p10.y*p10.y) - dist*dist); // distance from p1 to closest point
101  double d12 = hypot(p12.x, p12.y);
102  closest.x = p1.x + p12.x / d12 * d1c;
103  closest.y = p1.y + p12.y / d12 * d1c;
104  }
105 
106  // found smaller distance
107  if (init || dist < res.distance) {
108  // return closest point
109  res.closest_point = closest;
110 
111  // return line segment
112  res.closest_line.clear();
113  res.closest_line.push_back(p1);
114  res.closest_line.push_back(p2);
115 
116  // return distance
117  res.distance = dist;
118 
119  init = false;
120  }
121  }
122 
123  return true;
124 }

126 nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid area::get_gridmap ()
127 {
128  // no map existing yet, i.e., no map server
129  if (map_exists == false && create_map == true) {
130  // get coordinates
131  double xmin = numeric_limits<double>::max();
132  double xmax = numeric_limits<double>::min();
133  double ymin = numeric_limits<double>::max();
134  double ymax = numeric_limits<double>::min();
135  for (auto p : coords) {
136  if (p.x < xmin)
137  xmin = p.x;
138  if (p.x > xmax)
139  xmax = p.x;
140  if (p.y < ymin)
141  ymin = p.y;
142  if (p.y > ymax)
143  ymax = p.y;
144  }
145  int x = int(ceil((xmax - xmin) / resolution));
146  int y = int(ceil((ymax - ymin) / resolution));
147 
148  // warn about large grids
149  if (x*y > cell_warn)
150  ROS_WARN("Given coordinates seem wrong, grid map extremley large: %d cells!", x*y);
151 
152  // generate grid map data
153  cpswarm_msgs::OutOfBounds::Request req;
154  cpswarm_msgs::OutOfBounds::Response res;
155  vector<int8_t> data;
156  for (int i=0; i<y; ++i) { // row major order
157  for (int j=0; j<x; ++j) {
158  // check if cell is within area
159  req.pose.position.x = j * resolution + xmin;
160  req.pose.position.y = i * resolution + ymin;
161  out_of_bounds(req, res);
162 
163  // out of bounds
164  if (res.out)
165  data.push_back(100); // occupied
166 
167  // inside area
168  else
169  data.push_back(0); // free
170  }
171  }
172  map.data = data;
173 
174  // set map header
175  map.header.stamp = Time::now();
176  map.header.frame_id = "map";
177 
178  // set map meta data
179  map.info.map_load_time == Time::now();
180  map.info.resolution = resolution;
181  map.info.width = x;
182  map.info.height = y;
183 
184  // position of cell (0,0)
185  map.info.origin.position.x = xmin;
186  map.info.origin.position.y = ymin;
187 
188  map_exists = true;
189  }
190 
191  return map;
192 }
193 
194 bool area::get_map (nav_msgs::GetMap::Request &req, nav_msgs::GetMap::Response &res)
195 {
196  if (map_exists == false && create_map == false)
197  ROS_WARN("Providing empty map!");
198  res.map = get_gridmap();
199  return true;
200 }

202 bool area::get_origin (cpswarm_msgs::GetPoint::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::GetPoint::Response &res)
203 {
204  res.point = origin;
205  return true;

208 bool area::get_rotation (cpswarm_msgs::GetDouble::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::GetDouble::Response &res)
209 {
210  // get coordinates
211  geometry_msgs::Point pl, pb, pr;
212  pl.x = numeric_limits<double>::max();
213  pb.y = numeric_limits<double>::max();
214  pr.x = numeric_limits<double>::min();
215  for (auto p : coords) {
216  // left most point
217  if (p.x < pl.x || (p.x == pl.x && p.y < pl.y))
218  pl = p;
219 
220  // bottom most point
221  if (p.y < pb.y)
222  pb = p;
223 
224  // right most point
225  if (p.x > pr.x || (p.x == pr.x && p.y < pr.y))
226  pr = p;
227  }
228 
229  // no rotation required
230  if ((pl.x == pb.x && pl.y == pb.y) || (pr.x == pb.x && pr.y == pb.y))
231  return false;
232 
233  // rotate clockwise
234  if (pr.y < pl.y) {
235  res.value = -atan2(pr.y - pb.y, pr.x - pb.x);
236  }
237 
238  // rotate counter clockwise
239  else {
240  res.value = -atan2(pb.y - pl.y, pb.x - pl.x);
241  }
242 
243  return true;
244 }
245 
246 bool area::out_of_bounds (cpswarm_msgs::OutOfBounds::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::OutOfBounds::Response &res)
247 {
248  // the winding number counter, i.e., how often a ray from the point to the right crosses the boundary
249  int wn = 0;
250 
251  // loop through all edges of the polygon
252  for (int i = 0; i < coords.size(); ++i) {
253  // ray crosses upward edge
254  if (coords[i].y <= req.pose.position.y && coords[(i+1)%coords.size()].y > req.pose.position.y && is_left(coords[i], coords[(i+1)%coords.size()], req.pose.position))
255  ++wn;
256 
257  // ray crosses downward edge
258  else if (coords[i].y > req.pose.position.y && coords[(i+1)%coords.size()].y <= req.pose.position.y && is_right(coords[i], coords[(i+1)%coords.size()], req.pose.position))
259  --wn;
260  }
261 
262  // pose is outside
263  if (wn == 0)
264  res.out = true;
265 
266  // pose is inside
267  else
268  res.out = false;
269 
270  return true;
271 }
272 
273 void area::global_to_local ()
274 {
275  cpswarm_msgs::FixToPose f2p;
276 
277  // convert given area to local coordinates
278  vector<geometry_msgs::Point> local;
279  for (auto c : coords) {
280  f2p.request.fix.longitude = c.x;
281  f2p.request.fix.latitude = c.y;
282  if (fix_to_pose_client.call(f2p)) {
283  local.push_back(f2p.response.pose.pose.position);
284  }
285  else
286  ROS_FATAL("AREA_PROV - Failed to convert area bounds to local coordinates");
287  }
288  coords = local;
289 }
290 
291 void area::set_origin ()
292 {
293  if (global) {
294  cpswarm_msgs::FixToPose f2p;
295 
296  // get origin from gps node
297  ServiceClient get_gps_origin_client = nh.serviceClient<cpswarm_msgs::GetGpsFix>("gps/get_gps_origin");
298  ROS_DEBUG("Wait for get_gps_origin service...");
299  get_gps_origin_client.waitForExistence();
300  cpswarm_msgs::GetGpsFix gpso;
301  if (get_gps_origin_client.call(gpso)) {
302  // convert origin to local coordinates
303  f2p.request.fix = gpso.response.fix;
304  if (fix_to_pose_client.call(f2p)) {
305  origin = f2p.response.pose.pose.position;
306  }
307  else
308  ROS_FATAL("AREA_PROV - Failed to convert origin to local coordinates");
309  }
310  else
311  ROS_FATAL("AREA_PROV - Failed get GPS coordinates of origin");
312  }
313 
314  else {
315  // read origin from parameters
316  double x,y;
317  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/x", x, 0.0);
318  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/y", y, 0.0);
319  origin.x = x;
320  origin.y = y;
321  }
322 }
323 
324 bool area::is_left (geometry_msgs::Point p0, geometry_msgs::Point p1, geometry_msgs::Point p2)
325 {
326  // >0 for p2 left of the line through p0 and p1
327  // =0 for p2 on the line
328  // <0 for p2 right of the line
329  return ((p1.x - p0.x) * (p2.y - p0.y) - (p2.x - p0.x) * (p1.y - p0.y)) > 0;
330 }
331 
332 bool area::is_right (geometry_msgs::Point p0, geometry_msgs::Point p1, geometry_msgs::Point p2)
333 {
334  // >0 for p2 left of the line through p0 and p1
335  // =0 for p2 on the line
336  // <0 for p2 right of the line
337  return ((p1.x - p0.x) * (p2.y - p0.y) - (p2.x - p0.x) * (p1.y - p0.y)) < 0;
338 }
